title: (MODULES) Content Types

fields.label: Global Content Types
fields.name: global_content_types
fields.instructions: Please use the "Add a new content block" button to create blocks of content on this page. You can re-order by clicking and dragging.

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: block_type
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the block type. This can be a 2 column split (with or without images) or full width plain text block.

sub_fields.label: Image On
sub_fields.name: image_on
sub_fields.instructions: Please select which side you would like the image to appear.

sub_fields.label: Left Column Width
sub_fields.name: left_column_width
sub_fields.instructions: Left and right columns should be multiples of 12

sub_fields.label: Right Column Width
sub_fields.name: right_column_width
sub_fields.instructions: Left and right columns should be multiples of 12

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: split_image
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the image

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: full_width_content
sub_fields.instructions: Please insert your full-width text content. You can also add images here if you would like the text to wrap around the images (be careful of responsive sizing though)

sub_fields.label: Toggle
sub_fields.name: toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle this header on or off

sub_fields.label: Full Width
sub_fields.name: full_width
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, the header will stretch to the full width of the page. If unchecked it will fit within the standard content width.

sub_fields.label: Text Alignment
sub_fields.name: text_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Set the alignment of the text.

sub_fields.label: Title Type
sub_fields.name: title_type
sub_fields.instructions: If set to auto, the header text will be the page title. If custom you can change this text.

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: Parallax This
sub_fields.name: parallax_this
sub_fields.instructions: Use this sparingly - It will make the image parallax.

sub_fields.label: Parallax Speed
sub_fields.name: parallax_speed
sub_fields.instructions: 0 is minimum 1 is maximum (IE 0.7) - The default speed is recommended.

sub_fields.label: Turn On Overlay
sub_fields.name: turn_on_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Turn on the text overlay

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add a full width image block. This image should be at least 1200 pixels wide or you will not be able to upload it.

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: Downloads
sub_fields.name: downloads
sub_fields.instructions: Create a block of downloadable elements

sub_fields.label: Image Gallery
sub_fields.name: image_gallery
sub_fields.instructions: Add images to create an image gallery

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: Video Url
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions:
You should only add the code name. IE:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QOexw4cXfoY

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: Padding
sub_fields.name: padding
sub_fields.instructions: This adds a block of padding between elements.  The default is 30 Pixels.

sub_fields.label: Add a horizontal line
sub_fields.name: hr
sub_fields.instructions: If you would like this to be a horizontal line, then check this.

sub_fields.label: Ruler Height
sub_fields.name: ruler_height
sub_fields.instructions: Horizontal line height in pixels

sub_fields.label: Layout Title
sub_fields.name: layout_title
sub_fields.instructions: Name this content block

sub_fields.label: How Many Per Row
sub_fields.name: row_number
sub_fields.instructions: Please select how many teasers per row. You should then select this amount of teasers in the Relationship box below.

sub_fields.label: Teaser Component
sub_fields.name: teaser_component
sub_fields.instructions: Please add elements from the website - They are ordered on the frontend from left to right, so the top down order reflects the website positioning.

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Click on the image to edit the overlay information. Fill out Title, Caption and Alt.

description: These are the main page based content blocks
